title: map2d using camera based visibility
shortDescription: How to render a Map2D with CameraBasedVisibility
description:
This demo shows how to create and display a `Map2D`.

Use the `[W]`, `[A]`, `[S]`, and `[D]` keys to scroll the map.

The `CameraBasedVisibility` class is used as the visibilitor, and `RepeatingTilesProvoder` is used as the tile ID provider.
